entry.title: From ideas to actions - DeltaG participated in D4Gen Hackathon 2025

link.title: From ideas to actions - DeltaG participated in D4Gen Hackathon 2025

entry.content: Our DeltaG team took part in the D4Gen Hackathon 2025, held in the heart of Paris, France. It was a fantastic opportunity to present our project and gain valuable insights from startup experts.
entry.summary: Our DeltaG team took part in the D4Gen Hackathon 2025, held in the heart of Paris, France. It was a fantastic opportunity to present our project and gain valuable insights from startup experts.

entry.title: Research in review
entry.content: Take a look back at some of important papers in the field from this year.
